The problem is to find the maximum possible OR of a string given the following constraints:

The first line of input contains a single integer t (1 ≤ t ≤ 2·10^4) denoting the number of test cases. Each of the next t lines contain a single string s (1 ≤ |s| ≤ 2·10^5), consisting of lowercase English letters only. It is guaranteed that the sum of |s| over all test cases does not exceed 2·10^5. The output specification: For each test case, print "YES" if s is perfectly balanced or "NO" otherwise. You may print each letter in any case (for example, "Yes", "yEs", "YES", etc).
